text: getting hold of Jack to make the presentation, I run the damned party to the best of my ability - saying the sugary things you ought to have been there to say - and all you can do is to find fault.
handwritten_text: getting hold of Jack to make the presentation, I run the damned party to the best of my ability - saying the sugary things you ought to have been there to say - and all you can do is to find fault.
